title: Road Roamer
description: A dynamic car rental app offering custom car selection, seamless Stripe payments, and interactive map functionality.

title: RDW on Meta Quest 2
description: Redirected Walking algorithm enables user navigation in a large virtual environment while physically being present in a smaller space.

title: PolyA Explorer
description: PolyA is a visualization tool where users can query genes and graphically locate a part of the genome.

title: Pokedex
description: A simple Pokédex application that lets you browse and explore Pokémon data, with an AI-powered feature currently under development.
